price: Kubera iyo ntsinzi Imana Allah Yahaye Abaromani bakanesha Abafursi. Burya Imana Allah, Itabara uwo Ishatse agatsinda, Igatetereza uwo Ishatse agatsindwa; ni na Yo Nyenintsinzi-Mutaneshwa, Nyenimbabazi ku batoni bayo[2].
arabic: بِنَصۡرِ ٱللَّهِۚ يَنصُرُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَهُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
footnotes: [2] Ivyo rero vyabaye haciye ikiringo c’imyaka indwi kuva aho Abaromani banesherejwe n’Abafursi, maze Abaromani baranesha Abafursi, abislamu na bo baraheza banezerezwa n’iyo ntsinzi y’Abaromani kuko bari mu bahawe Igitabu, n’aho vyashitse bakagihindagura.

meta.transliteration: binaṣri al-lahi yanṣuru man yashāu wahuwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
